column4: hello i have ubuntu 5.1 is it easy enough to update the distro to the newer one through ubuntu or should i just download the new version ?
yes, but you can't skip releases so you have to upgrade 5.10 -> 6.06 -> 6.10 -> 7.04, so a backup and fresh install may be much faster
32bit unless you know exactly why you need 64bit
i dont know exactly why. Just though it could run better, or use the cpu better
